name: Carvanha
description: CARVANHA’s strongly developed jaws and its sharply pointed fangs pack the destructive power to rip out boat hulls. Many boats have been attacked and sunk by this POKéMON.

abilities.name: Rough Skin
abilities.effect: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage.  This ability functions identically to iron barbs.

abilities.name: Speed Boost
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Speed rises one stage after each turn.
